name: i-lateral/silverstripe-catalogue
description: Silverstripe module allowing creation of a custom product catalog with products and categories that can be created via the admin and accessed via their own URL's (like more conventional page objects)

suggest.silverstripe/cms: Add full content management support to your site
suggest.i-lateral/silverstripe-middleman: Add CMS vars, such as menu, searchform, etc to your site
suggest.i-lateral/silverstripe-users: Add user account management, login and registration
